oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Judy Smith oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, Judy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Excerpts of an oral history with Judy Smith, former Dean of Women and Associate Dean of Students at MTSU. Smith shares her memories of her administrative positions at MTSU during the 1960s and 1970s, specifically in relation to gender rules
1. 1960s rules for women and creation of the Rules Committee -- 2. Phase out of campus women's curfews -- 3. Smith's accomplishments as Dean of Women
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women college students; Deans of women; Women college administrators; Middle Tennessee State University
